many candidates there are among the 30,000 “gene pieces” to which Behe al-
ludes, that would yield a protein product able to play the necessary role.
Suppose that there are a thousand acceptable candidates for each of the four
positions in the molecule we need (TPA). The chance of success on any par-
ticular draw is now about 1 in 2.5 million. If there were 10,000 tries a year, it
